content.html:
To disable touch controls and hide the touch screen mode indica-
tor, select OFF for 8 BUTTON/DIAL SETTING > TOUCH SCREEN
SETTING > TOUCH SCREEN SETTING.

Before
You
Begin

AF AF/MF SETTING >
● Touch control settings can be adjusted using MF
TOUCH SCREEN MODE. For information on the touch controls
available during movie recording, see "Movie Recording ( TOUCH
SCREEN MODE; 210)".


1


MOVIE OPTIMIZED CONTROL


Selecting ON for □ MOVIE SETTING >
MOVIE OPTIMIZED CONTROL or


tapping the movie-optimized mode but-
ton in the shooting display optimizes the
command dials and touch controls for
movie recording. This can be used to pre-
vent camera sounds being recorded with
movie footage.


● SHUTTER SPEED
● APERTURE
● EXPOSURE COMPENSATION
● ISO
● INTERNAL MIC LEVEL
ADJUSTMENT/EXTERNAL MIC
LEVEL ADJUSTMENT


● WIND FILTER
● HEADPHONES VOLUME
● 업 FILM SIMULATION
● � WHITE BALANCE
● IS MODE
● IS MODE BOOST

● Enabling movie-optimized controls disables the aperture ring and
the shutter-speed, sensitivity, and exposure compensation dials.
● When movie-optimized control is enabled, the movie-optimized
mode button can be used to change shooting settings or disable
movie-optimized control.

1

# MOVIE OPTIMIZED CONTROL

Selecting ON for □ MOVIE SETTING >
MOVIE OPTIMIZED CONTROL or

tapping the movie-optimized mode but-
ton in the shooting display optimizes the
command dials and touch controls for
movie recording. This can be used to pre-
vent camera sounds being recorded with
movie footage.

![image](/image/placeholder)
AREA
10
SET
SET
Movie-optimized
mode button

- ● SHUTTER SPEED
- ● APERTURE
- ● EXPOSURE COMPENSATION
- ● ISO
- ● INTERNAL MIC LEVEL
- ADJUSTMENT/EXTERNAL MIC
- LEVEL ADJUSTMENT


- ● WIND FILTER
- ● HEADPHONES VOLUME
- ● 업 FILM SIMULATION
- ● � WHITE BALANCE
- ● IS MODE
- ● IS MODE BOOST


- ● Enabling movie-optimized controls disables the aperture ring and
- the shutter-speed, sensitivity, and exposure compensation dials.
- ● When movie-optimized control is enabled, the movie-optimized
- mode button can be used to change shooting settings or disable
- movie-optimized control.
